sim_scenarios.name: baseline_scenario
sim_scenarios.Description: TC 1 - Normal scenario, baseline for all performance degradations.
sim_scenarios.high_level_op_failure_probability_Commen: [Values: 0-1] Set probability to zero if you want to disable this feature
sim_scenarios.low_level_op_failure_probability_Comment: [Values: 0-1] Set probability to zero if you want to disable this feature
sim_scenarios.under_performance_factor_Comment: [Values: 1-Inf] What is the maximum factor in throughput increase for atomic operations
sim_scenarios.enable_path_changes_comment: [Values: 0, 1] When set to 1, enable path changes.
sim_scenarios.task_over_performance_factor_comment: [Values: 1-Inf] - Factor of performance improvement for `maintenance tasks`. Maintenance tasks time is divided by this factor
